    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterSumMultibodyShell

        public ClusterSumMultibodyShell​(ClusterSumMultibody coreCluster,
                                ClusterBonds[] subClusters,
                                double[] subClusterWeights,
                                MayerFunction[] f,
                                MayerFunctionNonAdditive[] fMulti)
        Constructs a cluster (shell) that depends on another ClusterSumMultibody instance (the core) to do the actual work of calculating all the f values. This class still does the work of multiplying f bonds together and summing diagrams together. MayerFunction arrays are needed only to make the ClusterSumMultibody superclass happy. Length of array should probably match core's f array.
